channel.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
channel.description:
[quote] Windows
* 1.5GHz or faster processor
* Microsoft® Windows® XP with Service Pack 2 (Service Pack 3 recommended) or Windows Vista® Home Premium, Business, Ultimate, or Enterprise with Service Pack 1 (certified for 32-bit Windows XP and 32-bit and 64-bit Windows Vista)
* 2GB of RAM
* 1.3GB of available hard-disk space for installation, plus 2GB of space for optional content; additional free space required during installation (cannot install on flash-based storage devices)
* 1,280x900 display with OpenGL 2.0–compatible graphics card
* DVD-ROM drive
* QuickTime 7.4.5 software required to use QuickTime features
* Broadband Internet connection required for online services [/quote] I pass all of those, yet the following error persists. Both in Adobe After Effects and Adobe Premiere.
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
What exactly is it referring to?

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Phat
item.description:
Also try cleaning up your registry (with ccleaner) that might work.

Read full topic
item.source: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Phat.:

If you want to somehow edit the installation you actually need the Windows Installer SDK
and let’s clear up some things

x86 = 32 bit
x64 = 64 bit

x84 = WTF
36 bits = also WTF

And after installing the software try to delete the system check part without screwing up the installation. This you will achieve by using INTERNET. Find out how to do stuff and things.

edit:
How do you expect us to help you without any info on your system? What’s you CPU,GPU,OS?..

Yeah the 84 and 36 was me thinking of dimension equations for my current graphic.

Here are my system specs.

CPU: AMD Athlon XP 2800+
GPU: nVidia GeForce 6200
OS: Windows XP Home Edition SP3

EDIT:
I’m currently trying my hand at getting Premiere to work instead. I’ll work on After Effects once I get some files sorted that I need for Orca.

Read full topic
item.source: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements

item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Phat.:

Works only with .msi installations clicky 'ere

Okay, I went there. I’m confused as to which to download. They have 2 64 bits and an 84… no 36s

EDIT: Nevermind the 84bit is working.

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Victus:

I lol’d.

Ironically I had a similar problem when I tried to upgrade a Vista 64bit computer to Windows 7, when I used the 32bit DVD the error was “You cannot upgrade from a 64bit system to 32bit” but when I used my 64bit DVD on the same system the error was “You cannot upgrade from a 32bit system to 64bit”…

Read full topic

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Well, I tried multiple different things. Tried to use CS4 [PC version since I tried the Mac version last time :facepalm:] and I can’t seem to get around the power PC bit. I think I’ll just use Sony Movie Maker.

Read full topic
item.source: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Guf:

If you have a PC then you don’t have a PowerPC CPU - windows doesn’t come in a PowerPC variety… In that case, the installer’s CPU check is borken…try contacting Adobe for support…

Gotcha, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Jambo:

Do you have a G Series Mac?

You have to have a certain type of CPU, and the architecture of yours is not compliant with the program

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PowerPC

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_PowerPC_processors

My Mac is currently on loan to my cousin so I’m stuck with my PC. So it looks like I’m shit out of luck. Thanks for the quick reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Adobe After Effects CS4 System Requirements
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Windows

  • 1.5GHz or faster processor

  • Microsoft® Windows® XP with Service Pack 2 (Service Pack 3 recommended) or Windows Vista® Home Premium, Business, Ultimate, or Enterprise with Service Pack 1 (certified for 32-bit Windows XP and 32-bit and 64-bit Windows Vista)

  • 2GB of RAM

  • 1.3GB of available hard-disk space for installation, plus 2GB of space for optional content; additional free space required during installation (cannot install on flash-based storage devices)

  • 1,280x900 display with OpenGL 2.0–compatible graphics card

  • DVD-ROM drive

  • QuickTime 7.4.5 software required to use QuickTime features

  • Broadband Internet connection required for online services

I pass all of those, yet the following error persists. Both in Adobe After Effects and Adobe Premiere.

What exactly is it referring to?

Read full topic
